lead_paragraph: An investigation into USA Gymnastics published Thursday determined the organization collected complaints of improper conduct by over 50 coaches between 1996 and 2006 and regularly declined to forward them on to the authorities unless expressly asked to do so, opening the door for further abuse in some cases.

headline.print_headline: Report: USA Gymnastics Declined to Look Into Potential Abuse
headline.main: Report: USA Gymnastics Declined to Look Into Potential Abuse
